data.title: Bishop Grimes Jr
data.meta_description: Bishop Grimes Jr-Sr High - East Syracuse, NY
data.text:
At Bishop Grimes, we believe access to quality-faith based education should be a right, not a privilege. We seek to make education equitable and inclusive by providing financial aid to deserving students who aspire to excel academically. Currently, 90% of our students receive some form of financial assistance. We are grateful to our donors who continue to support Bishop Grimes with gifts towards Financial Assistance.

To help gather donations for our students in need, we have launched a sweepstakes fundraiser! Tickets cost $100 and only 2,000 tickets will be sold. The grand prize is $50,000! We will have more cash awards with a total of 23 winners!

YOU can make a difference in the lives of our students! Purchase a sweepstakes ticket today! Email gracethorpe@syrdiocese.org.

To enter via mail, click to print a ticket application.
